column2: Failure to comply with applicable tax rules and regulations could result in enforcement actions or legal proceedings that may result in incremental tax payments and the application of late payment interest and penalties.

The Company believes that taxes are key contributors to the economic and social development of the communities in which we operate and play a vital role in creating long-term value. We are committed to fulfilling our fiscal obligations by administering and paying all required taxes. We work to maintain an open, honest, transparent relationship in all dealings with tax authorities. We do not use "tax haven" jurisdictions for the avoidance of tax.
